ygData.subject: Roleplay On Everquest
ygData.msgSnippet: ... OK, maybe I was a little over enthusiastic.  What I meant to say was that due to various touches such as the initial seperation of the races, Roleplay is
ygData.messageBody:
> Everquest is at it's roots, an lpc mud.
> lpc muds are about hack and slash.
> Everquest is very nicely graphical, but I'd hardly say that it demands, or
> even encourages Roleplay.


OK, maybe I was a little over enthusiastic. What I meant to say was that
due to various touches such as the initial seperation of the races, Roleplay
is much easier than with most of the other muds previously available. I
don't think Roleplaying will ever translate effectively through the medium
of computers, but EQ is as near as I've seen myself.

Steve
